timeline.bodyText:
I agree this name isn't great.  I think getUserFriendlyName would be an improvement.  Here are a few other, mostly bad names that might spark an idea of a better name:

getUserFriendlySimpleName
getUserFriendlyName
getPlainSimpleName
getUserUnderstandableSimpleName
getPrintableSimpleName
 getLegibleSimpleName
timeline.author: smillst

replies.bodyText:
I like getUserFriendlyName best among these suggestions (and it's better than the current name).
Another idea is:

getSimpleNameOrDescription
replies.author: mernst
